articles.title: Pope Francis Denies Resignation Rumors, Hopes To Visit Kyiv, Moscow
articles.description: Pope Francis has dismissed rumors he plans to resign anytime soon but said he might step down one day.
articles.content:
Pope Francis has dismissed rumors he plans to resign anytime soon, and says that he hopes to visit Moscow and Kyiv after traveling to Canada later this month.
